price: Kuma idan sun zo muku sai su ce: "Mun yi ĩmãni." Alhãli kuwa haƙĩƙa, sun shigo da kãfirci, kuma su lalle ne, sun fita da shi, kuma Allah ne Mafi sani ga abin da suka kasance sunã ɓõyewa.
arabic: وَإِذَا جَآءُوكُمۡ قَالُوٓاْ ءَامَنَّا وَقَد دَّخَلُواْ بِٱلۡكُفۡرِ وَهُمۡ قَدۡ خَرَجُواْ بِهِۦۚ وَٱللَّهُ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَا كَانُواْ يَكۡتُمُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
